name: Website Footer Improvement
description: A minimalist UI refresh of the website footer with an interactive contact form for basic inquiries (name, email, message).
goals: Refresh footer UI with clean, minimalist design
Add interactive contact form for basic inquiries
Improve visual appeal and user experience
Make it easy for visitors to get in touch
audience: Website visitors looking to contact the organization
constraints: Form must be lightweight and fast
success_criteria: Contact form is functional and easy to use
